configuration.docs:
**, string**: The type of circuit, one of `DOWNSTREAM` or `UPSTREAM`.

*See also: [Resistance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/resistance.html#configuration-variables)*

reference_voltage.docs:
**, float**: The reference voltage. Defaults to `3.3V`.

*See also: [Resistance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/resistance.html#configuration-variables)*

resistor.docs:
**, float**: The value of the resistor with a constant value.

*See also: [Resistance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/resistance.html#configuration-variables)*

sensor.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The sensor to read the voltage values from to convert to resistance readings.

*See also: [Resistance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/resistance.html#configuration-variables)*
